list.abs: You seem very chirpy today !, 今天你好像很快活似的!
Old Henry has been as chirpy as a cricket since he married that young girl ., 老亨利自从娶了那个轻的姑娘后一直非常活泼.
there was a chirpy noise , and a small striped Chipmunk appeared with a night light , and hoped he felt better ?那里有一阵快乐而活泼的声响，然后一只有条纹的小花栗鼠在灯光中现身，并问他可感到好一些？
The children seem particularly chirpy today ., 孩子们今天好象特别快活.

auth_sentence.content: Only on Strawberry Swing does Chris' chirpiness start to grate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only on Strawberry Swing does Chris' chirpiness start to grate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only on Strawberry Swing does Chris' chirpiness start to grate.
